title: Jennifer Echols, Playing Dirty 2013 (Stargazer series complete)

The adventures of the agents of Stargazer Public Relations firm and the stars they represent.

From book 2 :
A public relations expert tries to prevent the breakup of a raucous country band and corral their wildÃ¢â‚¬â€and very sexyÃ¢â‚¬â€lead singer in book 2 of the Stargazer Series.
